targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Pull Requests"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Total PRs
panels.description: Total number of pull requests created for this repository in the selected time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.merged_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Merged PRs"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Merged PRs
panels.description: Total number of pull requests successfully merged in the selected time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at))) as "Average Lead Time (seconds)"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Avg Lead Time
panels.description: Average time from PR creation to merge. Key DORA metric - shorter is better. Green <1 day, Yellow 1-3 days, Orange 3-7 days, Red >7 days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  SUM(pr.additions) as "Total Additions"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Lines Added
panels.description: Total lines of code added across all PRs in the selected period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  SUM(pr.deletions) as "Total Deletions"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Lines Removed
panels.description: Total lines of code removed across all PRs in the selected period. High deletions often indicate healthy refactoring

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  COUNT(*)::float / NULLIF(DATE_PART('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp), 0) as "PRs per Day"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: PRs Created/Day
panels.description: Average number of pull requests created per day. Indicates development activity level

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  COUNT(*)::float / NULLIF(DATE_PART('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp), 0) as "PRs per Day"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: PRs Merged/Day
panels.description: Average number of pull requests merged per day. Indicates delivery throughput for this repository

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(pr.additions + pr.deletions) as "Average PR Size (lines)"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Avg PR Size
panels.description: Average lines changed per PR (additions + deletions). Smaller PRs (<200 lines) are easier to review and less risky

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.review_requested_at - pr.created_at))) as "Coding Time"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.review_requested_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Coding Time
panels.description: Average time from PR creation to review request. Represents active development time before seeking feedback

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_review.submitted_at - COALESCE(pr.review_requested_at, pr.created_at)))) as "Review Wait Time"
FROM prs pr
JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT MIN(submitted_at) as submitted_at
  FROM pull_request_reviews
  WHERE pull_request_id = pr.id
) first_review ON true
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND first_review.submitted_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Review Wait Time
panels.description: Average time waiting for first review after requesting. Long wait times indicate review bottlenecks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(review_count) as "Avg Reviews"
FROM prs pr
JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_login) as review_count
  FROM pull_request_reviews
  WHERE pull_request_id = pr.id
) reviews ON true
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Reviews per PR
panels.description: Average number of distinct reviewers per PR. More reviewers = better knowledge sharing but potentially slower merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - first_review.submitted_at))) as "Review to Merge Time"
FROM prs pr
JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT MIN(submitted_at) as submitted_at
  FROM pull_request_reviews
  WHERE pull_request_id = pr.id
) first_review ON true
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND first_review.submitted_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Review to Merge
panels.description: Average time from first review to merge. Includes rework cycles and approval delays

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT author) as "Contributors"
FROM prs
WHERE repository_name = '$repository'
  AND created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.closed_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Closed PRs"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.state = 'CLOSED'
  AND pr.closed_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.closed_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Closed PRs (Not Merged)
panels.description: Pull requests that were closed without being merged

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.closed_at - pr.created_at))) as "Avg Time to Close"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.state = 'CLOSED'
  AND pr.closed_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.closed_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp

panels.title: Avg Time to Close
panels.description: Average time from PR creation to close (for PRs closed without merging)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN state = 'MERGED' THEN 1 END) /
    NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN state IN ('MERGED', 'CLOSED') THEN 1 END), 0),
    1
  ) as "Merge Rate"
FROM prs
WHERE repository_name = '$repository'
  AND (merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp AND merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
       OR closed_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp AND closed_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp)

panels.title: Merge Rate
panels.description: Percentage of PRs that were merged vs closed/abandoned. Higher is better

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN state = 'CLOSED' THEN 1 END) /
    NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN state IN ('MERGED', 'CLOSED') THEN 1 END), 0),
    1
  ) as "Abandonment Rate"
FROM prs
WHERE repository_name = '$repository'
  AND (merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp AND merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
       OR closed_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp AND closed_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp)

panels.title: PR Abandonment Rate
panels.description: Percentage of PRs that were closed without merging. Lower is better. High rates may indicate unclear requirements or process issues

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "PRs Created"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.merged_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as "PRs Merged"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
  AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  generate_series(
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeFrom()::timestamp),
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp),
    '1 day'::interval
  ) as time,
  (
    SELECT AVG(daily_count)::numeric(10,1)
    FROM (
      SELECT COUNT(*) as daily_count
      FROM prs pr
      WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
        AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
        AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
      GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at)
    ) daily_counts
  ) as "Average PRs Created"

SELECT
  generate_series(
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeFrom()::timestamp),
    DATE_TRUNC('day', $__timeTo()::timestamp),
    '1 day'::interval
  ) as time,
  (
    SELECT AVG(daily_count)::numeric(10,1)
    FROM (
      SELECT COUNT(*) as daily_count
      FROM prs pr
      WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
        AND pr.state = 'MERGED'
        AND pr.merged_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
        AND pr.merged_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
      GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.merged_at)
    ) daily_counts
  ) as "Average PRs Merged"

panels.title: PR Activity Over Time
panels.description: Daily PR creation and merge activity. Compare trends to identify delivery patterns and bottlenecks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', pr.created_at) as time,
  pr.state as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY time, metric
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  pr.title as "PR Title",
  pr.author as "Author",
  pr.state as "State",
  COALESCE(r.language, 'Unknown') as "Language",
  pr.additions as "Additions",
  pr.deletions as "Deletions",
  (pr.additions + pr.deletions) as "Total Changes",
  CASE
    WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 100 THEN 'Small'
    WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 500 THEN 'Medium'
    ELSE 'Large'
  END as "PR Size",
  pr.created_at as "Created At",
  pr.merged_at as "Merged At",
  CASE
    WHEN pr.merged_at IS NOT NULL THEN
      CASE
        WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) < 60 THEN
          ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at))) || ' seconds'
        WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) < 3600 THEN
          FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) / 60) || ' minutes ' ||
          ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) % 60) || ' seconds'
        WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) < 86400 THEN
          FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) / 3600) || ' hours ' ||
          FLOOR((EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) % 3600) / 60) || ' minutes'
        ELSE
          FLOOR(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) / 86400) || ' days ' ||
          FLOOR((EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (pr.merged_at - pr.created_at)) % 86400) / 3600) || ' hours'
      END
    ELSE NULL
  END as "Lead Time"
FROM prs pr
LEFT JOIN repositories r ON pr.repository_name = r.slug AND pr.repository_owner = r.org
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
ORDER BY pr.created_at DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, SUM(pr.additions + pr.deletions) DESC) as "#",
  pr.author as "Author",
  COUNT(*) as "PRs",
  SUM(pr.additions) as "Total Additions",
  SUM(pr.deletions) as "Total Deletions",
  SUM(pr.additions + pr.deletions) as "Total Changes",
  ROUND(AVG(pr.additions + pr.deletions)::numeric) as "Avg Changes",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 100 THEN 1 END) as "Small",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) > 100 AND (pr.additions + pr.deletions) <= 500 THEN 1 END) as "Medium",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN (pr.additions + pr.deletions) > 500 THEN 1 END) as "Large"
FROM prs pr
WHERE pr.repository_name = '$repository'
  AND pr.created_at >= $__timeFrom()::timestamp
  AND pr.created_at <= $__timeTo()::timestamp
GROUP BY pr.author
ORDER BY "PRs" DESC, "Total Changes" DESC

panels.title: Contributor Statistics
panels.description: Individual contributor metrics showing PR volume, code changes, and PR size distribution (Small <100, Medium 100-500, Large >500 lines)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT repository_name FROM prs ORDER BY repository_name
list.label: Repository
list.name: repository
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT repository_name FROM prs ORDER BY repository_name
